lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. star Bill Romanowski can continue coaching his 12-year-old son’s flag football team in Piedmont, Calif., after scolding another seventh-grader over what Romanowski, a former linebacker, considered dirty play, the recreation league’s director said yesterday.
